documents.document: You'll never find a rainbow if you're looking down - Charlie Chaplin
We come to love not by finding a perfect person, but by learning to see an imperfect person perfectly. - Sam Keen
An artist is someone who can hold two opposing viewpoints and still remain fully functional. - F. Scott Fitzgerald
Places that are empty of you are empty of life. - Dante Gabriel Rossetti
Give your weakness to one who helps. - Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi
I will bring you a whole person and you will bring me a whole person and we will have us twice as much of love and everything. - Mari Evans
there comes a time when you have to let go all the words all the teaching and trust the infinite - Billy Doyle
There is no passion to be found playing small - in settling for a life that is less than the one you are capable of living. - Nelson Mandela
Love doesn't make the world go 'round; love is what makes the ride worthwhile. - Franklin P. Jones
Happiness is when what you think, what you say, and what you do are in harmony. - Mahatma Gandhi
If you think you are too small to make a difference, try sleeping with a mosquito. - Dalai Lama XIV
One day you will kiss a man you can't breathe without, and find that breath is of little consequence. - Karen Marie Moning
If you don't feel as close to God today as you did yesterday, who moved? - Chris Heimerdinger
The glory of a good tale is that it is limitless and fluid; a good tale belongs to each reader in its own particular way. - Stephen King
Tomorrow is a new day; begin it well and serenely and with too high a spirit to be encumbered with your old nonsense. - Ralph Waldo Emerson
Life keeps throwing me lemons because I make the best lemonade... - King James Gadsden
Leaders live by choice, not by accident. - Mark Gorman
You have to get out in some rain to find your rainbows - Brad Perks
There are no classes in life for beginners: right away you are always asked to deal with what is most difficult. - Rainer Maria Rilke
Hidden Disney Characters In Other Disney Films - https://t.co/TJKAC4BSCv https://t.co/w3qZrb5RcZ
Go as far as you can see. When you get there, you can see farther. - Thomas Carlyle
We do not need to go out and find love; rather, we need to be still and let love discover us. - John O'Donohue
The key is to figure out how God can effectively use you where you're planted now, regardless of how you got there. - Stacy Hawkins Adams
Those who judge others should know how to judge themselves. - Santosh Kalwar
Even if you're on the right track, you'll get run over if you just sit there. - Will Rogers
Buy a pup and your money will buy Love unflinching that cannot lie. - Rudyard Kipling
The way I see it, if you want the rainbow, you gotta put up with the rain! - Dolly Parton
Marriage is long enough to have plenty of room for time behind it. - William Faulkner
Starting a long way off the true point by loops and zigags, we now and then arrive just where we ought to be. - George Elliott
Life was meant to be lived, and curiosity must be kept alive. One must never, for whatever reason, turn his back on life - Eleanor Roosevelt
And yet,to say the truth, reason and love keep little company together nowadays. - William Shakespeare
In this world everything changes except good deeds and bad deeds; these follow you as the shadow follows the body. - Bhikkhu Bodhi
Lots of people want to ride with you in the limo, but a true friend will take the bus with you when the limo breaks down. - Oprah Winfrey
Wise men speak because they have something to say; fools because they have to say something. - Plato
The opinion which other people have of you is their problem, not yours. - Elisabeth Kübler-Ross
You were born with wings, why prefer to crawl through life? - Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi
Doing the best at this moment put you in the nest place for the next moment. - Oprah Winfrey
You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough. - Mae West
Your world is a living expression of how you are using and have used your mind. - Earl Nightingale
When someone is in your heart, they're never truly gone. They can come back to you, even at unlikely times. - Mitch Albom
It's better to light a candle than to curse the darkness. - Eleanor Roosevelt
When the power of love, will overcome the love of power; the world will know peace. - Jimi Hendrix
Decide what you want to be.... Pay the Price ... And be what you want to be. - John A. Widtsoe
But life is a battle: may we all be enabled to fight it well! - Charlotte Brontë
The unfading beauty of a gentle and quiet spirit is of great worth in God's sight. - Judith Couchman
The ultimate reason for setting goals is to entice you to become the person it takes to achieve them - Jim Rohn
Love can change a person the way a parent can change a baby- awkwardly, and often with a great deal of mess. - Lemony Snicket
Life begets life. Energy becomes energy. It is by spending oneself that one becomes rich. - Sarah Bernhardt
A day without laughter is a day wasted. - Charlie Chaplin
When real people fall down in life, they get right back up and keep on walking. - Michael Patrick King

Wherever the art of Medicine is loved, there is also a love of Humanity. - Hippocrates
Things You Should Never Send Your Ex - https://t.co/a6kVnn0B2v https://t.co/0OXL5T2KTI
There are many trails up the mountain, but in time they all reach the top. - Anya Seton
It's a sad day when you find out that it's not accident or time or fortune, but just yourself that kept things from you. - Hellman, Lillian
Life begins on the other side of despair. - Jean-Paul Sartre
You need not regret lost years if you have learned great things. - Jack Cady
Top Manchester United Wags - https://t.co/Vq49IweEzY https://t.co/hCTyxPqWqo
All great achievements require time. - Maya Angelou
The moment you stop to think about whether you love someone, you've already stopped loving that person forever. - Carlos Ruiz ZafÃ³n
Middle age is when you've met so many people that every new person you meet reminds you of someone else. - Ogden Nash
Keep in mind to be kind. - A. Volta
Those who try to do something and fail are infinitely better than those who try nothing and succeed. (adapted) - Lloyd Jones
Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up. - Thomas A. Edison
A blanket attempt to avoid mistakes is the biggest mistake of all. - Steve McConnell
A book is a device to ignite the imagination. - Alan Bennett
Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened. - Dr. Seuss
What would you attempt to do if you knew you could not fail? - Robert H. Schuller
Dignity lies not in possessing honors....but in deserving them. - Aristotle
A man who dares to waste one hour of time has not discovered the value of life - Charles Darwin
Books are lighthouses erected in the great sea of time. - Edwin Percy Whipple
Love is precious. Treasure it and those who give it. Lavish it more on those who don't. - Shalonda "Treasure" Williams
Everything has its wonders, even darkness and silence, and I learn, whatever state I may be in, therein to be content - Helen Keller
I postpone death by living, by suffering, by error, by risking, by giving, by losing. - Anaïs Nin
Don't part with your illusions. When they are gone you may still exist, but you have ceased to live. - Mark Twain
Only in the agony of parting do we look into the depths of love. - George Eliot
Every moment in life is an act of faith - Paulo Coelho
Always bear in mind that your own resolution to succeed is more important than any one thing. - Abraham Lincoln
Love is not something you think about, it is a state in which you dwell - Christopher Moore
Life without risk is life wasted. - Santosh Kalwar
Be empty of worrying. Think of who created thought! Why do you stay in prison When the door is so wide open? - Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi
I feel more alive when I'm writing than I do at any other time-except maybe when I'm making love. - May Sarton
Not all popular novelists are good, but all good novelists are, sooner or later, popular. - Dean Koontz
Answered prayer is the interchange of love between the Father and His child. - Andrew Murray
None are so old as those who have outlived enthusiasm. - Henry David Thoreau
When we sin and mess up our lives, we find that God doesn't go off and leave us- he enters into our trouble and saves us. - Eugene Peterson
It ought to make us feel ashamed when we talk like we know what we're talking about when we talk about love. - Raymond Carver
To realize one's Personal Legend is a person's only real obligation. - Paulo Coelho
peace is not about the absence of conflict but it is about the presence of sincerity. - Toge Aprilianto
Writing is more than a gift. It is a struggle that blesses those who see it through to the end. - Nona King
Life is what you make of it. Always has been, always will be. - Grandma Moses
Life is a dream for the wise, a game for the fool, a comedy for the rich, a tragedy for the poor. - Sholem Aleichem
Remember that the best relationship is one in which your love for each other exceeds your need for each other. - Dalai Lama XIV
I would rather make mistakes in kindness and compassion than work miracles in unkindness and hardness. - Mother Teresa
The most decisive actions of our life ... are most often unconsidered actions. - AndrÃ© Gide
A change is brought about because ordinary people do extraordinary things. - Barack Obama
Our Age of Anxiety is, in great part, the result of trying to do today's jobs with yesterday's tools! - Marshall McLuhan
It is love, not reason, that is stronger than death. - Thomas Mann
